body_html:
Great! If you have that on the TODO list maybe I should leave it to you.
One question: isn't this just the old "tag" field that was in Summary::Value that's used by the old summary module? Why not use that field?

Great! If you have that on the TODO list maybe I should leave it to you.
One question: isn't this just the old "tag" field that was in Summary::Value that's used by the old summary module? Why not use that field?
